original: Majjhima Nikāya 73
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Mahāvacchasutta
analyzed: mahāvaccha sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha kho vacchagottaḥ paribbājakaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho vacchagottaḥ paribbājakaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “dīgharattāhaṁ bhotā gotamena sahakathī.
analyzed: dīgharattā aham bhotā gotamena sahakathī

original: Sādhu me bhavaṁ gotamo saṅkhittena kusalākusalaṁ desetū”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhavam gotamaḥ saṅkhittena kusala akusalam desetu uti

original: “Saṅkhittenapi kho te ahaṁ, vaccha, kusalākusalaṁ deseyyaṁ, vitthārenapi kho te ahaṁ, vaccha, kusalākusalaṁ deseyyaṁ;
analyzed: saṅkhittena api kho te aha vaccha kusala akusalam deseyya vitthārena api kho te aha vaccha kusala akusalam deseyya

original: api ca te ahaṁ, vaccha, saṅkhittena kusalākusalaṁ desessāmi.
analyzed: api ca te aha vaccha saṅkhittena kusala akusalam desessāmi

original: Taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhoti kho vaccha gottaḥ paribbājakaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Lobho kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, alobho kusalaṁ;
analyzed: lobho kho vaccha akusala alobho kusala

original: doso kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, adoso kusalaṁ;
analyzed: dosaḥ kho vaccha akusala a dosaḥ kusala

original: moho kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, amoho kusalaṁ.
analyzed: mohaḥ kho vaccha akusala a mohaḥ kusala

original: Iti kho, vaccha, ime tayo dhammā akusalā, tayo dhammā kusalā.
analyzed: iti kho vaccha ime tayaḥ dhammā akusalā tayaḥ dhammā kusalā

original: Pāṇātipāto kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī kusalaṁ;
analyzed: pāṇātipātaḥ kho vaccha akusala pāṇātipātā veramaṇī kusala

original: adinnādānaṁ kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, adinnādānā veramaṇī kusalaṁ;
analyzed: adinnādānam kho vaccha akusala adinnādānā veramaṇī kusala

original: kāmesumicchācāro kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇī kusalaṁ;
analyzed: kāmesum icchā ācāraḥ kho vaccha akusala kāmesum icchā ācārā veramaṇī kusala

original: musāvādo kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, musāvādā veramaṇī kusalaṁ;
analyzed: musāvādaḥ kho vaccha akusala musāvādā veramaṇī kusala

original: pisuṇā vācā kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī kusalaṁ;
analyzed: pisuṇā vācā kho vaccha akusala pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī kusala

original: pharusā vācā kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī kusalaṁ;
analyzed: pharusā vācā kho vaccha akusala pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī kusala

original: samphappalāpo kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, samphappalāpā veramaṇī kusalaṁ;
analyzed: samphappalāpo kho vaccha akusala samphappalāpā veramaṇī kusala

original: abhijjhā kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, anabhijjhā kusalaṁ;
analyzed: abhijjhā kho vaccha akusala anabhijjhā kusala

original: byāpādo kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ, abyāpādo kusalaṁ;
analyzed: kho vaccha akusala a byāpādaḥ kusala

original: micchādiṭṭhi kho, vaccha, akusalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi kusalaṁ.
analyzed: micchā diṭṭhi kho vaccha akusalam sammā diṭṭhi kusala

original: Iti kho, vaccha, ime dasa dhammā akusalā, dasa dhammā kusalā.
analyzed: iti kho vaccha ime dasa dhammā akusalā dasa dhammā kusalā

original: Yato kho, vaccha, bhikkhuno taṇhā pahīnā hoti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā
analyzed: yatas kho vaccha bhikkhuno taṇhā pahīnā hoti ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthuka tā anabhāvaṅka tā

original: āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā, so hoti bhikkhu arahaṁ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro
analyzed: āyatim an uppāda dhammā so hoti bhikkhu araham khīṇa āsavaḥ vusitavā kata karaṇīyaḥ ohita bhāro

original: anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto”ti.
analyzed: an uppatta sat atthaḥ parikkhīṇa bhava sayojano sammad aññā vimutto ti

original: “Tiṭṭhatu bhavaṁ gotamo.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu bhavam gotamaḥ

original: Atthi pana te bhoto gotamassa ekabhikkhupi sāvako yo āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti?
analyzed: atthi pana te bhoto gotamassa sāvako yaḥ āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati iti

original: “Na kho, vaccha, ekaṁyeva sataṁ na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na
analyzed: na kho vacche ekayā iva satam na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na

original: pañca satāni, atha kho bhiyyova ye bhikkhū mama sāvakā āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ
analyzed: pañca satāni atha kho bhiyyova ye bhikkhū mama sāvakāḥ āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimutti

original: paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
analyzed: paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti iti

original: “Tiṭṭhatu bhavaṁ gotamo, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu bhavam gotamaḥ tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū

original: Atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekā bhikkhunīpi sāvikā yā āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti?
analyzed: atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekā bhikkhunī ipi sāvikā yā āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati iti

original: “Na kho, vaccha, ekaṁyeva sataṁ na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na
analyzed: na kho vacche ekayā iva satam na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na

original: pañca satāni, atha kho bhiyyova yā bhikkhuniyo mama sāvikā āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ
analyzed: pañca satāni atha kho bhiyyas va yāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ mama sāvikāḥ āsavānam khayā anāsava

original: cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti.
analyzed: cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti iti

original: “Tiṭṭhatu bhavaṁ gotamo, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhuniyo.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu bhavam gotamaḥ tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū tiṭṭhantu bhikkhuniyaḥ

original: Atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekupāsakopi sāvako gihī odātavasano brahmacārī yo pañcannaṁ
analyzed: atthi pana bhoto gotamassa eka upāsakaḥ api sāvakaḥ gihī odāta vasanaḥ brahmacārī

original: orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā”ti?
analyzed: orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātikaḥ tattha parinibbāyī an āvatti dhammo tasmā lokā ati

original: “Na kho, vaccha, ekaṁyeva sataṁ na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na
analyzed: na kho vacche ekayā iva satam na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na

original: pañca satāni, atha kho bhiyyova ye upāsakā mama sāvakā gihī odātavasanā brahmacārino
analyzed: pañca satāni atha kho bhiyyova ye upāsakāḥ mama sāvakāḥ gihī odāta vasanāḥ brahmacārinaḥ

original: pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyino anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā”ti.
analyzed: pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinaḥ an āvatti dhammā tasmā lokāti

original: “Tiṭṭhatu bhavaṁ gotamo, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhuniyo, tiṭṭhantu upāsakā gihī odātavasanā brahmacārino.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu bhavam gotamaḥ tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū tiṭṭhantu bhikkhuniyaḥ tiṭṭhantu upāsakāḥ gihī odāta vasanāḥ brahmacārino

original: Atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekupāsakopi sāvako gihī odātavasano kāmabhogī sāsanakaro
analyzed: atthi pana bhoto gotamassa eka upāsakaḥ api sāvakaḥ gihī odāta vasano kāma bhogī sāsana karo

original: ovādappaṭikaro yo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṅkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo
analyzed: ovāda paṭikaraḥ yaḥ tiṇṇa vicikicchaḥ vigata kathaṅkathaḥ vesārajja ppatto apara ppaccayaḥ

original: satthusāsane viharatī”ti?
analyzed: satthu sāsane viharati iti

original: “Na kho, vaccha, ekaṁyeva sataṁ na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na
analyzed: na kho vacche ekayā iva satam na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na

original: pañca satāni, atha kho bhiyyova ye upāsakā mama sāvakā gihī odātavasanā kāmabhogino
analyzed: pañca satāni atha kho bhiyyova ye upāsakāḥ mama sāvakāḥ kāma bhoginaḥ

original: sāsanakarā ovādappaṭikarā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā
analyzed: sāsana karāḥ ovāda paṭikarāḥ tiṇṇa vicikicchāḥ vigata kathaṅkathāḥ vesārajja ppattāḥ apara ppaccayāḥ

original: satthusāsane viharantī”ti.
analyzed: satthu sāsane viharanti iti

original: “Tiṭṭhatu bhavaṁ gotamo, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhuniyo, tiṭṭhantu upāsakā gihī odātavasanā brahmacārino, tiṭṭhantu upāsakā gihī odātavasanā kāmabhogino.
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu bhavam gotamaḥ tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū tiṭṭhantu bhikkhuniyaḥ tiṭṭhantu upāsakāḥ gihī odāta vasanāḥ brahmacārinaḥ tiṭṭhantu upāsakāḥ gihī odāta vasanāḥ kāmabhogino

original: Atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekupāsikāpi sāvikā gihinī odātavasanā brahmacārinī yā
analyzed: atthi pana bhoto gotamassa eka upāsikā api sāvikā gihinī odāta vasanā brahmacārinī yā

original: pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinī anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā”ti?
analyzed: pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyinī an āvatti dhammā tasmā lokā ti

original: “Na kho, vaccha, ekaṁyeva sataṁ na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na
analyzed: na kho vacche ekayā iva satam na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na

original: pañca satāni, atha kho bhiyyova yā upāsikā mama sāvikā gihiniyo odātavasanā brahmacāriniyo
analyzed: pañca satāni atha kho bhiyyova yāḥ upāsikāḥ mama sāvikāḥ gihiniyaḥ odāta vasanāḥ brahmacāriniyaḥ

original: pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā opapātikā tattha parinibbāyiniyo
analyzed: pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā opapātikāḥ tattha parinibbāyiniyo

original: anāvattidhammā tasmā lokā”ti.
analyzed: an āvatti dhammā tasmai

original: “Tiṭṭhatu bhavaṁ gotamo, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū, tiṭṭhantu bhikkhuniyo, tiṭṭhantu upāsakā
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu bhavam gotamaḥ tiṭṭhantu bhikkhū tiṭṭhantu bhikkhuniyaḥ tiṭṭhantu upāsakā

original: gihī odātavasanā brahmacārino, tiṭṭhantu upāsakā gihī odātavasanā kāmabhogino, tiṭṭhantu
analyzed: gihī odāta vasanāḥ brahmacārino tiṭṭhantu upāsakāḥ gihī odāta vasanāḥ kāmabhogino tiṭṭhantu

original: upāsikā gihiniyo odātavasanā brahmacāriniyo.
analyzed: upāsikāḥ gihiniyaḥ odāta vasanāḥ

original: Atthi pana bhoto gotamassa ekupāsikāpi sāvikā gihinī odātavasanā kāmabhoginī sāsanakarā
analyzed: atthi pana bhoto gotamassa eka upāsikā api sāvikā gihinī odāta vasanā kāma bhoginī sāsana karā

original: ovādappaṭikarā yā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā
analyzed: ovāda paṭikarā yā tiṇṇa vicikicchā vigata kathaṅkathā vesārajja ppattā apara paccayā

original: satthusāsane viharatī”ti?
analyzed: satthu sāsane viharati iti

original: “Na kho, vaccha, ekaṁyeva sataṁ na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na
analyzed: na kho vacche ekayā iva satam na dve satāni na tīṇi satāni na cattāri satāni na

original: pañca satāni, atha kho bhiyyova yā upāsikā mama sāvikā gihiniyo odātavasanā kāmabhoginiyo
analyzed: pañca satāni atha kho bhiyyova yāḥ upāsikāḥ mama sāvikāḥ gihiniyaḥ odāta vasanāḥ kāma bhoginiyaḥ

original: sāsanakarā ovādappaṭikarā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṅkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā
analyzed: sāsana karāḥ ovāda paṭikarāḥ tiṇṇa vicikicchāḥ vigata kathaṅkathāḥ vesārajja ppattāḥ apara ppaccayāḥ

original: satthusāsane viharantī”ti.
analyzed: satthu sāsane viharanti iti

original: “Sace hi, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavaṁyeva gotamo ārādhako abhavissa, no ca kho bhikkhū ārādhakā abhavissaṁsu;
analyzed: sace hi bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavayā iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ abhavissa no ca kho bhikkhū ārādhakāḥ abhavissasu

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ aparipūraṁ abhavissa tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam a paripūram abhavissa tena aṅgena

original: Yasmā ca kho, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako bhikkhū ca ārādhakā;
analyzed: yasmai ca kho bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavan ca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ bhikkhū ca ārādhakā

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ paripūraṁ tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam paripūram tena aṅgena

original: Sace hi, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako abhavissa, bhikkhū ca ārādhakā abhavissaṁsu, no ca kho bhikkhuniyo ārādhikā abhavissaṁsu;
analyzed: sace hi bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavañca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ abhavissa bhikkhū ca ārādhakāḥ abhavissasu no ca kho bhikkhuniyaḥ ārādhikāḥ abhavissasu

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ aparipūraṁ abhavissa tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam a paripūram abhavissa tena aṅgena

original: Yasmā ca kho, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako, bhikkhū ca ārādhakā, bhikkhuniyo ca ārādhikā;
analyzed: yasmai ca kho bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavañca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ bhikkhū ca ārādhakāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ca ārādhikā

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ paripūraṁ tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam paripūram tena aṅgena

original: Sace hi, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako abhavissa, bhikkhū ca
analyzed: sace hi bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavan ca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ abhavissa bhikkhū ca

original: ārādhakā abhavissaṁsu, bhikkhuniyo ca ārādhikā abhavissaṁsu, no ca kho upāsakā gihī
analyzed: ārādhakāḥ abhavissasu bhikkhuniyaḥ ca ārādhikāḥ abhavissasu no ca kho upāsakāḥ gihī

original: odātavasanā brahmacārino ārādhakā abhavissaṁsu;
analyzed: odāta vasanāḥ brahmacārinaḥ ārādhakāḥ abhavissasu

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ aparipūraṁ abhavissa tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam a paripūram abhavissa tena aṅgena

original: Yasmā ca kho, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako, bhikkhū ca ārādhakā, bhikkhuniyo ca ārādhikā, upāsakā ca gihī odātavasanā brahmacārino ārādhakā;
analyzed: yasmā ca kho bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavañca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ bhikkhū ca ārādhakāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ca ārādhikāḥ upāsakā ca gihī odāta vasanāḥ brahmacārino ārādhakā

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ paripūraṁ tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam paripūram tena aṅgena

original: Sace hi, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako abhavissa, bhikkhū ca
analyzed: sace hi bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavan ca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ abhavissa bhikkhū ca

original: ārādhakā abhavissaṁsu, bhikkhuniyo ca ārādhikā abhavissaṁsu, upāsakā ca gihī odātavasanā
analyzed: ārādhakāḥ abhavissasu bhikkhuniyaḥ ca ārādhikāḥ abhavissasu upāsakā ca gihī odāta vasanā

original: brahmacārino ārādhakā abhavissaṁsu, no ca kho upāsakā gihī odātavasanā kāmabhogino
analyzed: brahmacārinaḥ ārādhakāḥ no ca kho upāsakāḥ gihī odāta vasanāḥ kāma bhoginaḥ

original: ārādhakā abhavissaṁsu;
analyzed: ārādhakāḥ abhavissasu

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ aparipūraṁ abhavissa tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam a paripūram abhavissa tena aṅgena

original: Yasmā ca kho, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako, bhikkhū ca ārādhakā,
analyzed: yasmai ca kho bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavan ca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ bhikkhū ca ārādhakā

original: bhikkhuniyo ca ārādhikā, upāsakā ca gihī odātavasanā brahmacārino ārādhakā, upāsakā
analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ ca ārādhikāḥ upāsakā ca gihī odāta vasanāḥ brahmacārino ārādhakāḥ upāsakā

original: ca gihī odātavasanā kāmabhogino ārādhakā;
analyzed: ca gihī odāta vasanā kāma bhoginaḥ ārādhakā

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ paripūraṁ tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam paripūram tena aṅgena

original: Sace hi, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako abhavissa, bhikkhū ca
analyzed: sace hi bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavan ca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ abhavissa bhikkhū ca

original: ārādhakā abhavissaṁsu, bhikkhuniyo ca ārādhikā abhavissaṁsu, upāsakā ca gihī odātavasanā
analyzed: ārādhakāḥ abhavissasu bhikkhuniyaḥ ca ārādhikāḥ abhavissasu upāsakā ca gihī odāta vasanā

analyzed: brahmacārinaḥ ārādhakāḥ upāsakā ca gihī odāta vasanā kāma bhoginaḥ ārādhakā

original: abhavissaṁsu, no ca kho upāsikā gihiniyo odātavasanā brahmacāriniyo ārādhikā abhavissaṁsu;
analyzed: abhavissasu no ca kho upāsikāḥ gihiniyaḥ odāta vasanāḥ brahmacāriniyaḥ ārādhikāḥ abhavissasu

analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam a paripūram abhavissa tena aṅgena

analyzed: brahmacārinaḥ ārādhakāḥ upāsakā ca gihī odāta vasanā kāma bhoginaḥ ārādhakā

analyzed: abhavissasu upāsikā ca gihiniyaḥ odāta vasanāḥ brahmacāriniyaḥ ārādhikāḥ abhavissasu

original: Yasmā ca kho, bho gotama, imaṁ dhammaṁ bhavañceva gotamo ārādhako, bhikkhū ca ārādhakā,
analyzed: yasmai ca kho bho gotamaḥ imam dhammam bhavan ca iva gotamaḥ ārādhakaḥ bhikkhū ca ārādhakā

analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ ca ārādhikāḥ upāsakā ca gihī odāta vasanāḥ brahmacārino ārādhakāḥ upāsakā

analyzed: ca gihī odāta vasanā kāma bhoginaḥ ārādhakāḥ upāsikā ca gihiniyaḥ odāta vasanāḥ brahmacāriniyaḥ

original: ārādhikā, upāsikā ca gihiniyo odātavasanā kāmabhoginiyo ārādhikā;
analyzed: ārādhikā upāsikā ca gihiniyaḥ odāta vasanā kāma bhoginiyaḥ ārādhikā

original: evamidaṁ brahmacariyaṁ paripūraṁ tenaṅgena.
analyzed: evam idam brahmacariyam paripūram tena aṅgena

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, gaṅgā nadī samuddaninnā samuddapoṇā samuddapabbhārā samuddaṁ
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bho gotama gaṅgā nadī samudda ninnā samudda poṇā samudda pabbhārā samudda

original: āhacca tiṭṭhati, evamevāyaṁ bhoto gotamassa parisā sagahaṭṭhapabbajitā nibbānaninnā
analyzed: āhacca tiṭṭhati evam eva ayam bhoto gotamassa parisā sagaha ṭṭha pabbajitā nibbāna ninnā

original: nibbānapoṇā nibbānapabbhārā nibbānaṁ āhacca tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: nibbāna poṇā nibbāna pabbhārā nibbānam āhacca tiṭṭhati

original: Abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama …pe…
analyzed: abhikkanta bho gotama pe

original: esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: esā aham bhavantam gotamam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Labheyyāhaṁ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṁ, labheyyaṁ upasampadan”ti.
analyzed: labheyya aham bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajja labheyyam upasampadanti

original: “Yo kho, vaccha, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṁ, ākaṅkhati
analyzed: yaḥ kho vaccha añña titthiya pubbaḥ imasmin dhamma vinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajje ākaṅkhati

original: upasampadaṁ, so cattāro māse parivasati. Catunnaṁ māsānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū
analyzed: upasampadā saḥ cattāraḥ māse parivasati catunnam māsānam accayena āraddha cittāḥ bhikkhū

original: pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya;
analyzed: pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhu bhāvāya

original: api ca mettha puggalavemattatā viditā”ti.
analyzed: api ca mā ittha puggala vematta tā viditā ati

original: “Sace, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbā imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhantā pabbajjaṁ, ākaṅkhantā
analyzed: sace bhante añña titthiya pubbā imasmin dhamma vinaye ākaṅkhantā pabbajje ākaṅkhantā

original: upasampadaṁ cattāro māse parivasanti, catunnaṁ māsānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū
analyzed: upasampadam cattāraḥ māse parivasanti catunnam māsānam accayena āraddha cittāḥ bhikkhū

original: pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhubhāvāya; ahaṁ cattāri vassāni parivasissāmi. Catunnaṁ
analyzed: pabbājenti upasampādenti bhikkhu bhāvāya aham cattāri vassāni parivasissāmi

original: vassānaṁ accayena āraddhacittā bhikkhū pabbājentu upasampādentu bhikkhubhāvāyā”ti.
analyzed: vassānaṃ accayena āraddha cittāḥ bhikkhū pabbājentu upasampādentu bhikkhu bhāvāya ati

original: Alattha kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavato santike pabbajjaṁ alattha upasampadaṁ.
analyzed: alattha kho vaccha gottaḥ paribbājakaḥ bhagavato santike pabbajjam alattha upasampadaḥ

original: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā vacchagotto addhamāsūpasampanno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: acira upasampannaḥ kho pana ayasmai vaccha gottaḥ addhamāsu upasampannaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā

original: vacchagotto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: vacchagottaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “yāvatakaṁ, bhante, sekhena ñāṇena sekhāya vijjāya pattabbaṁ, anuppattaṁ taṁ mayā;
analyzed: bhante sekhena ñāṇena sekhāya vijjāya an uppattam tam mayā

original: uttari ca me bhagavā dhammaṁ desetū”ti.
analyzed: uttari ca me bhagavā dhammam desetu uti

original: “Tena hi tvaṁ, vaccha, dve dhamme uttari bhāvehi—samathañca vipassanañca.
analyzed: tena hi tva vaccha dve dhamme uttari vipassanañca

original: Ime kho te, vaccha, dve dhammā uttari bhāvitā—samatho ca vipassanā ca—anekadhātupaṭivedhāya saṁvattissanti.
analyzed: ime kho te vaccha dve dhammā uttari ca vipassanā ca aneka dhātu paṭivedhāya savattissanti

original: So tvaṁ, vaccha, yāvadeva ākaṅkhissasi:
analyzed: saḥ tva vaccha yāvat eva ākaṅkhissasi

original: ‘anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhaveyyaṁ—ekopi hutvā bahudhā assaṁ, bahudhāpi hutvā
analyzed: aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhaveyya ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā assa bahudhā api hutvā

original: eko assaṁ; āvibhāvaṁ, tirobhāvaṁ; tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno
analyzed: ekaḥ assa āvi bhāva tiro bhāva tiro kuṭṭam tiro pākāram tiro pabbatam a sajjamānaḥ

original: gaccheyyaṁ, seyyathāpi ākāse; pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjaṁ kareyyaṁ, seyyathāpi udake;
analyzed: gaccheyya sā iyathā api ākāse pathaviyā api ummujja nimujjam kareyya sā iyathā api udake

original: udakepi abhijjamāne gaccheyyaṁ, seyyathāpi pathaviyaṁ; ākāsepi pallaṅkena kameyyaṁ,
analyzed: udake api abhijjamāne gaccheyya seyyathā api pathaviye ākāse pi pallaṅkena kameyya

original: seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo; imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā
analyzed: seyyathā api pakkhī sakuṇaḥ ime api candima sūriye eva mahiddhike eva mahā anubhāve pāṇinā

original: parimaseyyaṁ, parimajjeyyaṁ; yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteyyan’ti,
analyzed: parimaseyya parimajjeyya yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam vatteyyanti

original: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇissasi, sati satiāyatane.
analyzed: tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇissasi sati sati āyatane

original: So tvaṁ, vaccha, yāvadeva ākaṅkhissasi:
analyzed: saḥ tva vaccha yāvat eva ākaṅkhissasi

original: ‘dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇeyyaṁ—dibbe ca mānuse ca, ye dūre santike cā’ti, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇissasi, sati satiāyatane.
analyzed: dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkanta mānusikāya ubho sadde suṇeyya dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca ati tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇissasi sati sati āyatane

original: So tvaṁ, vaccha, yāvadeva ākaṅkhissasi:
analyzed: saḥ tva vaccha yāvat eva ākaṅkhissasi

original: ‘parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajāneyyaṁ—

original: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇissasi, sati satiāyatane.
analyzed: tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇissasi sati sati āyatane

original: So tvaṁ, vaccha, yāvadeva ākaṅkhissasi:
analyzed: saḥ tva vaccha yāvat eva ākaṅkhissasi

original: ‘anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussareyyaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo tissopi
analyzed: aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussareyya seyyathida ekam pi jātim dve pi jātiyaḥ tissaḥ api

original: jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṁsampi jātiyo

original: anekepi saṁvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṁvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe—amutrāsiṁ
analyzed: aneke api savaṭṭa kappe aneke api vivaṭṭa kappe aneke api savaṭṭa vivaṭṭa kappe amutra asi

original: evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī evamāyupariyanto,
analyzed: eva nāmaḥ evaṃgotto eva vaṇṇo evam āhāro eva sukha dukkha paṭisavedī evam āyu pariyanto

original: so tato cuto amutra udapādiṁ; tatrāpāsiṁ evaṁnāmo evaṅgotto evaṁvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṁsukhadukkhappaṭisaṁvedī
analyzed: saḥ tatas cutaḥ amutra udapādi tatra apāsim eva nāmaḥ evaṃgottaḥ eva vaṇṇo evam āhāraḥ eva sukha dukkha ppaṭisavedī

original: evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapannoti; iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ
analyzed: evam āyu pariyantaḥ saḥ tatas cutaḥ idhu upapanno ti iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihita

original: pubbenivāsaṁ anussareyyan’ti,
analyzed: pubbenivāsam anussareyyanti

original: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇissasi, sati satiāyatane.
analyzed: tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇissasi sati sati āyatane

original: So tvaṁ, vaccha, yāvadeva ākaṅkhissasi:
analyzed: saḥ tva vaccha yāvat eva ākaṅkhissasi

original: ‘dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passeyyaṁ cavamāne upapajjamāne
analyzed: dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena satte passeyyam cavamāne upapajjamāne

original: hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammūpage satte pajāneyyaṁ—ime vata
analyzed: hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathā kammūpage satte pajāneyya ime vata

original: bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā manoduccaritena
analyzed: bhonto sattā kāya duccaritena samannāgatāḥ vacī duccaritena samannāgatāḥ manaḥ duccaritena

original: samannāgatā ariyānaṁ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā, te kāyassa
analyzed: samannāgatāḥ ariyānam upavādakāḥ micchādiṭṭhikāḥ micchādiṭṭhi kamma samādānā te kāyassa

original: bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapannā; ime vā pana bhonto
analyzed: bhedāḥ param maraṇāḥ apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapannāḥ ime vā pana bhontaḥ

original: sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā
analyzed: sattā kāya su caritena samannāgatā vacī su caritena samannāgatā manaḥ su caritena samannāgatā

original: ariyānaṁ anupavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhikammasamādānā, te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ
analyzed: ariyānaṃ an upavādakā sammādiṭṭhikā sammādiṭṭhi kamma samādānā te kāyassa bhedā para

original: maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapannāti; iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena
analyzed: maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapannā ati iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena

original: satte passeyyaṁ cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate
analyzed: satte passeyyam cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate

original: yathākammūpage satte pajāneyyan’ti,
analyzed: yathākammūpage satte pajāneyyanti

original: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇissasi, sati satiāyatane.
analyzed: tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇissasi sati sati āyatane

original: So tvaṁ, vaccha, yāvadeva ākaṅkhissasi:
analyzed: saḥ tva vaccha yāvat eva ākaṅkhissasi

original: ‘āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
analyzed: āsavānam khayā anāsavam cetaḥ vimuttim paññā vimuttim diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyanti

original: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇissasi, sati satiāyatane”ti.
analyzed: tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇissasi sati sati āyatane iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā vacchagotto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vacchagottaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho āyasmā vacchagotto eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā vaccha gottaḥ ekaḥ vūpakaṭṭhaḥ appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ viharantaḥ nacira ssevayassatthāya

original: kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ
analyzed: kula puttā sammad eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tad anuttara brahmacariya pariyosāna

original: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
analyzed: diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati

original: Aññataro kho panāyasmā vacchagotto arahataṁ ahosi.
analyzed: aññataraḥ kho pana ayasman vaccha gotto arahatam ahosi

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ dassanāya gacchanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhū bhagavantam dassanāya gacchanti

original: Addasā kho āyasmā vacchagotto te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante.
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmā vacchagotto te bhikkhū dūratas va āgacchante

original: Disvāna yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
analyzed: disvāna yena te bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etat avoca

original: “handa kahaṁ pana tumhe āyasmanto gacchathā”ti?
analyzed: handa kaham pana tumhe āyasmantaḥ gacchatha ati

original: “Bhagavantaṁ kho mayaṁ, āvuso, dassanāya gacchāmā”ti.
analyzed: bhagavantam kho mayaḥ āvuso dassanāya gacchāma ati

original: “Tenahāyasmanto mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha, evañca vadetha:
analyzed: tena ha ayasmantaḥ mama vacanena bhagavataḥ pāde sirasā vandatha evañca vadetha

original: ‘vacchagotto, bhante, bhikkhu bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadeti—
analyzed: vaccha gottaḥ bhante bhikkhu bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati evam ca vadeti

original: pariciṇṇo me bhagavā, pariciṇṇo me sugato’”ti.
analyzed: pariciṇṇaḥ me bhagavā pariciṇṇaḥ me sugataḥ iti

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vacchagottassa paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmataḥ vaccha gottassa

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te bhikkhū bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “āyasmā, bhante, vacchagotto bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadeti:
analyzed: bhante vacchagottaḥ bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati evam ca vada iti

original: ‘pariciṇṇo me bhagavā, pariciṇṇo me sugato’”ti.
analyzed: pariciṇṇaḥ me bhagavā pariciṇṇaḥ me sugataḥ iti

original: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, vacchagotto bhikkhu cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
analyzed: pubbā iva me bhikkhave vaccha gottaḥ bhikkhu cetasā cetaḥ paricca viditaḥ

original: ‘tevijjo vacchagotto bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo’ti.
analyzed: tevijjaḥ vaccha gottaḥ bhikkhu mahiddhikaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ ti

original: Devatāpi me etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ:
analyzed: devatā api me etam attham ārocesu

original: ‘tevijjo, bhante, vacchagotto bhikkhu mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo’”ti.
analyzed: tevijjaḥ bhante vaccha gottaḥ bhikkhu mahiddhikaḥ mahā anubhāvaḥ ti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Mahāvacchasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: mahāvaccha suttam niṭṭhitam tatiya
